name: Valrayvn
description: The Valrayvn, also known as the Val, is a Ranger class ship that has tha ability to dodge incoming projectiles and then it goes "pew pew" in your face and your ship dies in like 2 seconds.
obtaining: In order to get this hull, you can farm Onyx targets in order to get the blueprints for its weapons and armor along with the hull itself. I recommend getting the blueprint using event points then building Vals with Nova Missiles (not Nova Driver) in order to farm for the rest of the blueprints.
tips-builds: Get this hull as soon as possible, since it is great for farming and fighting.
author: owojammer128
